alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 12:02PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Itawamba and north central Monroe Counties through 1230 PM CST... At 1202 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Evergreen, or 9 miles south of Fulton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fulton, Smithville, Tremont, Fairview, New Salem, Evergreen, Clay, Abney, Eastman, Cardsville, Turon, Tilden, Bounds Crossroads, Jacinto and Cadamy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
